title: Happy Holidays from the Diva of Do-ahead: A Year of Feasts to Celebrate With Family And Friends
features: Provides 125 easy-to-prepare recipes designed to minimize the stress associated with holiday hosting, in a reassuring guide that provides menu recommendations for twelve annual celebrations while sharing complementary tips on table settings, decorations, and beverages. Simultaneous.
description: Diane Phillips has been teaching her easy, elegant, do-ahead approach to parties and holiday get-togethers at cooking schools around the country for more than 15 years. She is a spokesperson for Lipton Recipe Secrets and the author of several cookbooks, including Perfect Party Food, The Ultimate Rotisserie Cookbook, and The Soup Mix Gourmet. She is also the author of The Perfect Basket: How to Make a Fabulous Gift Basket for Any Occasion.

I travel and teach cooking classes all over the country, spending 1/2 the year in a small hill town in Italy, teaching in the Dordogne region of France and at Rancho La Puerta in Mexico. Teaching is my passion and I love being able to do something that I love that includes meeting my readers and students all over the country.
